title: Ticket #4963: Re-order DAGMan config knobs in the manual
description: There are a ton of DAGMan config knobs, and they vary widely in how often they're used. Because of that, I think it would be good to do something in the manual to make it easier to find the more-commonly-used one. Probably the simplest idea is to just put the commonly-used ones at the top and the least commonly-used ones at the bottom of the DAGMan section...
remarks:
2015-Mar-26 11:02:51 by wenger:
Karen says I should send her a list in the desired order...

2015-Nov-13 14:22:02 by wenger:
Or else order them alphabetically. Anything sensible would be better than what we have now...

2016-Mar-09 14:07:41 by wenger:
Hmm -- maybe make subsections, such as "throttling", "rescue DAGs", etc...

I also want to note which knobs users should rarely change.
